title: Committee Adopts Medicines and Related Substances Amendment Bill (Parliament of South Africa)
text: ( Source : Parliament of South Africa ) Parliament , Wednesday 21 October 2015 - The Select Committee on Social Services today agreed to the amended Medicines and Related Substances Bill [B6D-2014] after deliberations and considerations. This
